Plot path coefficients and their confidence intervals.

Plot path coefficients and their confidence intervals.

coef_plot(fitted_DAG, reverse_order = FALSE)

Arguments

fitted_DAG

A fitted DAG, usually obtained by best, average or est_DAG.
reverse_order

If TRUE, the paths are plotted in reverse order. Particularly useful in combination with ggplot2::coor_flip to create horizontal versions of the plot.

Value

A ggplot object.

Examples

  d <- DAG(LS ~ BM, NL ~ BM, DD ~ NL + LS)
  plot(d)
  d_fitted <- est_DAG(d, rhino, ape::corBrownian, rhino_tree)
  plot(d_fitted)
  coef_plot(d_fitted)
  # to create a horizontal version, use this:
  coef_plot(d_fitted, reverse_order = TRUE) + ggplot2::coord_flip()

Contents
